film.title: The Spirit of Christmas
film.summary: Kate, a workaholic lawyer, has three weeks to get a haunted bed and breakfast appraised and sold. The uncooperative manager claims a spirit who lives there will not approve.

guestOne.name: Jessica St. Clair
guestOne.bio: The very talented and renowned American actress and improv comedian Jessica St. Clair is known best for her work in the NBC series, Best Friends Forever. Jessica St. Clair net worth is known best to have been sourced from her work in TV series and movies like Itâ€™s Complicated, Life As We Know It, Wanderlust, Labor Pains, Veep, and more. Jessica St. Clair IMDB profile has details of her awards, TV series, and movies.

results.episodeDescription: HDTGM All-star Jessica St. Clair joins Paul, Jason, and June (via Jury Duty) to discuss the Hallmark classic The Spirit of Christmas. They break down everything about this story of a young lawyer who finds romance with a spirit that takes the form of a human 12 days before Christmas. Plus, Paul shares his ghost sighting story.
